Text:
Hey Stokeman!

I was hoping you'd seed these here now that Demonoid is offline.

Thank you a gazillion times for keeping us C2C fans supplied no matter what the trouble.

You are the BEST!  :D
Thanks so much Stokey. I see it's a bit slim just now on seeding, so I'll try to give it a boost.
When Demonoid was cruelly murdered I thought I lost you and your wonderful C2C torrents forever! Oh the joyous surprise when I found you here!! Thank you for not giving up on us. *hug*
Thanks Stokeman! Your uploads are always appreciated.
Thanks Again Stokeman, I was going through withdrawals after Demonoid was shut down!! I'm so glad to see you again, really appreciate the effort!!

hey Stokeman

Was worried I would never hear your torrents again with the demise of demonoid. Guess the internet isnt so big after all.

Thanks a lot Stokeman...

Your c2c uploads help me get through the day...
Thanks a lot Stokeman. I/WE really appreciate your hard work. Please keep it up it's a great bank of knowledge generally over looked by the masses.
